meanings.meaning: what became, has become, will become of somebody/something?

vlive.korean: 조만간 알게 될 거다! You are going to find out soon! 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 멍멍 ✌️
vlive.english: You are going to find out soon!

vlive.korean: '시간 지나면 좋은 추억이 될 거다'. "It will be a good memory after some time". 듣기 View video GOT7 : [Full] JJ PROJECT X Orgel Live - JJ PROJECT의 오르골라이브
vlive.english: "It will be a good memory after some time".

vlive.korean: "이번에 앨범 잘 될 거다, 아마" 라고 하셨어요. She added, "I'm pretty sure your album would be going so well". 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : SEVENTEEN 'Going Seventeen' COMEBACK COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: She added, "I'm pretty sure your album would be going so well".

vlive.korean: 그리고 그 마음이 다 닿아서 이렇게 당신의 절대적인 팬이 될 거다. And all that will create absolute fans for you. 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : 골든 포춘 쿠키 in 대기실 2nd DAY / Backstage Golden Fortune Cookie Live 2nd DAY
vlive.english: And all that will create absolute fans for you.

vlive.korean: 지금도 안 보여요 - 될 거야 - 지금처럼 고르는 거 아니야? I still can't see it - It'll work. - Do we have to set it like this? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 캐럿 모여라🥰
vlive.english: I still can't see it - It'll work. - Do we have to set it like this?

examples.korean: No one really listens to anyone else, and if you try it for a while you'll see why. (Mignon McLaughlin) 발음듣기 아무도 남의 말을 듣지 않는다. 한 번 시도해 보면 이유를 알게 될거다. (미뇽 머클로플린, 언어명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: No one really listens to anyone else, and if you try it for a while you'll see why. (Mignon McLaughlin) 발음

examples.korean: Everything is going to be all right. 발음듣기 모든 게 잘 될 거다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everything is going to be all right. 발음

examples.korean: You’ll be in a fix. 발음듣기 궁지에 몰리게 될 거다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll be in a fix. 발음

examples.korean: Without your good name, you would be nothing. 발음듣기 네 이름을 더럽히면 넌 쓸모없는 인간이 될 거다. Neungyule
examples.english: Without your good name, you would be nothing. 발음

examples.korean: You will come around to my way of thinking sooner or later. 발음듣기 곧 내 사고방식에 동조하게 될거다. Neungyule
examples.english: You will come around to my way of thinking sooner or later. 발음
